short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows you information about tags deployed using Signal Tag.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on to Signal allows you to explore fired tags in ways that the console alone cannot. Observe when tags are fired and detect server-direct tag fires. The Signal Inspector makes debugging tags easier than ever. Note: A valid Signal account is needed to take advantage of this extension.
